attributes.long-description:
TOMB RAIDER -After a storm destroys the boat she was travelling on, a frightened young woman is left washed ashore on an unknown beach. On her own but not alone she has only one goal, to survive.

SLEEPING DOGS - In this open-world game, you are Wei Shen, an undercover cop trying to take down the Triads from the inside. You'll have to prove yourself worthy as you fight your way up the organization, taking part in brutal criminal activities without blowing your cover. Torn between the badge & the code of the triads, you will risk everything.

JUST CAUSE 2 - On the isl& nation of Panau, rival gangs wage war in the streets while the ruthless dictator Baby Panay exercises a system of oppression & corruption against his own people. Your friend & mentor Tom Sheldon has disappeared with top-secret intel & millions in Agency cash. As Rico Rodriguez, the Agency's most dangerous weapon, you must infiltrate the isl& & locate Sheldon, setting off a violent chain of events that will set Panau ablaze.

Player 1, Network Players 2-8, 4144MB Required Hard Drive Space, 720P HD Video Output (480P, 720P). Dualshock 3, Headset

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.

Action Triple Pack © 2014 Square Enix Ltd. All Rights Reserved. Published by Square Enix Inc., 2015. Just Cause 2 published by Square Enix Ltd. Developed by Avalanche Studios. Sleeping Dogs published by Square Enix Ltd. Developed by United Front Games. Tomb Raider published by Square Enix Ltd. Developed by Crystal Dynamics. JUST CAUSE 2, SLEEPING DOGS, TOMB RAIDER, LARA CROFT, CRYSTAL DYNAMICS, EIDOS-MONTREAL, SQUARE ENIX, and the SQUARE ENIX logo are registered trademarks or trademarks of the Square Enix group.
attributes.name: Ultimate Action Triple Pack
